00010 #ifndef INCLcaeventmaskh
00011 #define INCLcaeventmaskh
00012 
00013 /*
00014         event selections
00015         (If any more than 8 of these are needed then update the 
00016         select field in the event_block struct in db_event.c from 
00017         unsigned char to unsigned short)
00018 
00019 
00020         DBE_VALUE 
00021         Trigger an event when a significant change in the channel's value
00022         occurs. Relies on the monitor deadband field under DCT.
00023 
00024         DBE_LOG
00025         Trigger an event when an archive significant change in the channel's
00026         valuue occurs. Relies on the archiver monitor deadband field under DCT.
00027 
00028         DBE_ALARM
00029         Trigger an event when the alarm state changes
00030 
00031 */
00032 #define DBE_VALUE       (1<<0)
00033 #define DBE_LOG         (1<<1)
00034 #define DBE_ALARM       (1<<2)
00035 
00036 #endif
